weeklyTopNews.title: Sydney CBD coronavirus cluster grows to 41 as NSW creates travel bubble along Victoria border
weeklyTopNews.summary: New South Wales recorded 13 new cases overnight. A cluster at a gym in Sydney has now been linked to 41 cases.

weeklyTopNews.link: Victoria's roadmap out of Covid lockdown â€“ what we know so far
weeklyTopNews.title: https://www.theguardian.com/australia-news/2020/aug/31/victorias-roadmap-out-of-covid-lockdown-what-we-know-so-far
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victorian Premier Daniel Andrews announced that he will lay out a reopening timeline on Sunday, stressing that it will take months, not weeks

weeklyTopNews.title: At-risk tenants of Victoria's public housing towers to be offered private rentals
weeklyTopNews.summary: The Victorian government is launching a new $31.7 million initiative to provide at-risk public housing tenants with leases to private rental properties.

weeklyTopNews.title: Daniel Andrews says lockdown 'is working', as Victoria's daily coronavirus infections drop below 100
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria's daily coronavirus numbers dropped below 100 for the first time in 2 months. The state reported only 95 cases in the last 24 hours, the lowest number since July 5th. There were also 18 more deaths overnight, taking the state's toll to 513, and the country's to 600.
